Rulings.Edison:
●If you switch the target of this card with Collected Power or Tailor of the Fickle you don't select a new Attribute.
●The newly equipped monster becomes the Attribute that was originally selected when Scroll of Bewitchment was activated, even if it is the same as the monster’s original Attribute.

Rulings.Base: 1. If you switch the target of this card with "Collected Power" or "Tailor of the Fickle" you do not select a new Attribute. The newly equipped monster becomes the Attribute that was originally selected when "Scroll of Bewitchment" was activated, even if it is the same as the monster's original Attribute.
